com.mlt.desktop.control

Class StatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.StatusBar

  • public class StatusBar
extends Pane
    A status bar displays labels and progress bars, with an optional label, accessed by key
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

        totalWork - Total work.
